posts.description: dylanaraps/pure-bash-bible: ðŸ“– A collection of pure bash alternatives to external processes.
posts.extended: The goal of this book is to document commonly-known and lesser-known methods of doing various tasks using only built-in bash features. Using the snippets from this bible can help remove unneeded dependencies from scripts and in most cases make them faster.

posts.description: skeeto/endlessh: SSH tarpit that slowly sends an endless banner
posts.extended: Endlessh is an SSH tarpit that very slowly sends an endless, random SSH banner. It keeps SSH clients locked up for hours or even days at a time. The purpose is to put your real SSH server on another port and then let the script kiddies get stuck in this tarpit instead of bothering a real server.
